text: Pleodendron is a genus of plants in family Canellaceae described as a genus in 1899.Tieghem, Philippe Édouard Léon van. 1899. Journal de Botanique (Morot) 13: 271Tropicos, Pleodendron Tiegh. Pleodendron is native to Central America and the West Indies.Kew World Checklist of Selected Plant FamiliesDavidse, G., M. Sousa Sánchez, S. Knapp & F. Chiang Cabrera. 2014. Cycadaceae a Connaraceae. 2(1): ined. In G. Davidse, M. Sousa Sánchez, S. Knapp & F. Chiang Cabrera (eds.) Flora Mesoamericana.
